name: Mixed Up Monsters
description:
In Mixed up Monsters your goal is to shuffle together 3 OP Monsters to create a Boss you can beat. Each Part gives the Boss a different trait or ability, so it's up to you to experiment and find which combinations can be fought successfully.

We were slightly short on time, so didn't manage to get explanations for each part into the game. So you can either trial and error to find out what each part does, or scroll to the bottom of this page to see a Full table of parts and abilities:

Credits:

AaronBacon - Programming and Game Design - https://aaronsnetwork.com/
Checker_Box - Art and Character Design - https://twitter.com/Checker_Box_

Controls:

A and D or Left and Right Arrows - Move

S or Down Arrow - Duck

Left Click - Shoot

Spacebar - Jump

Controllers are also supported

Ability Table Body PartEffectBrute HeadLaser Eyes - Shoots Fast Lasers periodicallyBrute ArmsFireballs- Throws Fireballs at you Brute BodyArmour - Increases Monster HealthBrute LegsTree Legs - Reduces stun effect from being hit Speedster Body Leap Ability- The monster can lunge at youSpeedster OtherSpeed + - Increases speed for each part addedHacker HeadBlackout - the Monster causes you to black out periodicallyHacker BodyGlitch - Monster can Short range teleportHacker ArmsAttack sabotage - Increases your attack CooldownHacker LegsSpeed Sabotage - Reduces Your Speed
